transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan, Pradeep sir.
Customer: Haan, boliye koi lead feed nahi hai, koi lead dijiye.
Executive: Accha nahi dikh raha hai kya aapko abhi? Ek second rukiye.
Customer: Nahi, abhi koi lead nahi mil raha hai.
Executive: Accha, accha, accha, ruko.

Executive: Ek baar sir mujhe apna woh batlana.
Customer: Haan, hello. Ek baar aap mujhe apna primary number batana sir, jo number hai na aapka?
Customer: Kaunsa wala?
Executive: Jo number aapka account mein map hai, primary number.
Customer: Accha, mera wala number 6291.
Executive: Ek second ruko.

Customer: 629143
Executive: 439099.
Customer: 9099.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Nahi sir, yeh toh nahi hai.
Customer: Kaunsa number chahiye aapko?
Executive: Yeh jo account mein primary pe hai na aapka number?
Customer: Haan, yahi number mera add hai primary pe.

Executive: Ek second rukna sir, aap ek second ruko na.
Customer: Rukiye, rukiye, rukiye.


Executive: Uh, okay. Yeh abhi aapke paas yeh jo yeh jo Vasudev ka aaya tha message 15 tarikh ko inse baat kiya tha sir aapne?
Customer: Nahi, phone toh nahi kiya Vasudev haan.
Executive: Hai na?
Customer: Haan. To file attach kuch chahiye tha inko.
Executive: Isko phone karu main?
Customer: Haan, nahi nahi, aise bhi kya aa raha tha na sir ki IndiaMART pe jitna bhi aata hai na.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: To unko na phir hume phone karna padta hai. Abhi aapne jo mujhe number diya hai na apna.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, us number pe na main aapko ek message bhej raha hu, theek hai?
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Haan, ek second ruko, maine aapko last baar bhi bheja tha. Kaise kaise hume karna hai. Ek baar aap woh main ek link laga raha Google Meet ka link.
Customer: WhatsApp pe dala hai aapne message?
Executive: Haan, maine hi kiya abhi toh WhatsApp pe. Haan, haan, haan, haan.
Executive: Hai na? To kya hota hai na sir ki IndiaMART ka kya rehta hai na ki sir waha pe hamare paas jo customer aate hai na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, to unse na hume connect karna padta hai call laga ke.
Customer: Accha, haan, phone toh main lagata hu. Main to roz lagata hu. Kal bhi ek lagaya tha, kal do jagah lagaya tha.
Executive: Haan. To ek purchase ho gaya aur dusre ka uh, abhi bata rahe hai, bola hai.
Executive: Accha woh jinse baat hua unhone kya bola?
Customer: Unhone bola theek hai batate hai. Abhi ek baar phone phir se kiya tha, baat nahi kiya.
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: Accha baat nahi kiya hai na?
Customer: Haan. Haan matlab yeh thoda rehta hai issue. Yeh actually uh, aur ek Kolkata se phone aaya tha, maine Kolkata ke party ko phone kiya, usne kaha ki thodi der baad phone karta hu main.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Phir phone nahi kiya hoga na?
Executive: Hmm, hmm, hmm.

Executive: Haan phir last baar maine aapko jo WhatsApp pe jo screenshot bheje the na.
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: Aap waise hi dekh rahe ho saari leads wagera?
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Last baar maine aapko teen chaar screenshot bheje the na WhatsApp pe?
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: Haan, aap waise hi laga rahe ho na filter wagera sab kuch?
Customer: Haan, haan, main filter toh laga raha hu.
Executive: Hai na? Maine ek link bheja hai aapko WhatsApp pe, ek baar check karo aap.
Customer: Accha, theek hai.
Executive: Haan, theek hai, main check kar raha hu usko. Kya sir?
Customer: Check kar lena.
Executive: Hello. Haan, main check kar raha hu.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir, check karke na aapko na usko join karna hai.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Haan, haan, to kya hai na ki apna screen share karke main thoda aapko acche se idea de sakta hu in cheezon ka, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai, theek hai, main screen share karta hu.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai, okay sir. Hmm, hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving any buyleads.

- Executive needs the primary number for verification.



Resolution:

- Executive verified the customer's primary number.

- Executive sent a WhatsApp message with a Google Meet link.

- Executive offered to guide the customer via screen sharing.



Next Steps: 

- Customer agreed to join the Google Meet session.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, primary number, google meet, whatsapp
